abstract.text: The documentation context manages the in-memory model for the built documentation.

inlineContent.text: discovers serialized documentation bundles from a variety of sources (files on disk, databases, or web services), provides them to the
and notifies the context when bundles are added or removed using the

When a documentation bundle is registered with the context, all of its content is loaded into memory and relationships between documentation entities are built. When this is done, the context can be queried
about documentation entities, resources, and relationships between entities.

abstract.text: Combine code comments with markup prose to produce structured, semantic documentation.
